Service Details: - Provides support to persons with celiac disease and gluten intolerance through programs of awareness, advocacy, education, research and coaching, especially to the newly diagnosed - Available to answer questions regarding Gluten free diet/lifestyle from those who have been living gluten free for many years
How to Apply: Please visit our website or call the toll free line for membership inquiries
Cost: Membership ; - $65 for the first year, paid to the national organization, which includes local membership - Annual renewals are $50 - Discounts available when signing on for more than one year
Meetings: Details of our meetings, potlucks and Wellness Hours (led by licensed dietitian) are available through our website www.kelownaceliac.org
Address & Map: 994 Tronson DrKelowna, BC     V1Y 4E1View MapQuest Map
Print Material: Newsletters are sent by email  or post to paid members, dietitians and other chapters quarterly.
